attributes.action: Instruct the National Grid to take down all its Electricity Pylons along the length of the M65 motorway and put the cables underground.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The M65 motorway runs through some of the most beautiful scenery in the country. This wonderful landscape is utterly ruined along its entire length by these ugly technological monstrosities which should have been demolished long ago in favour of underground cables.
